hero.name: James Gangi
hero.title: Fullstack Software Engineer || Computer Science && Math
hero.subtitle: I am highly interested in all things technology and business related. Beyond coding, I play chess, and love to ski! I'm open to trying new activities the same way that I'm willing to learn new tools and technologies most suitable for the job.
hero.description: Hey, I'm James Gangi, a full-stack software engineer based in Northern Virginia / Washington DC.

about.title: About
about.content: I'm passionate about creating software that improves lives.

professional.title: Professional Journey
professional.content:
I'm from Centreville, VA and currently based in Washington DC. My journey into software began in high school, leading me to pursue a degree in Computer Science with a minor in Mathematics at James Madison University.

I later graduated and got a job with Costar Group, where I contributed to enterprise product development, building applications that streamlined contract making and processing for our large sales team.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
skills: Skilled in ReactJS, AngularJS, TypeScript, .NET, C#, and Node.js.
Experience in caching, query optimization, and API efficiency.
Proficient in Micro Front-Ends and modular design.
Strong with GitHub, TFS, and CI/CD
Expertise in SQL, procedure deployment, and optimization.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on

portfolio.title: Stock Portfolio Analytics
portfolio.description: A React TypeScript application for tracking and visualizing stock portfolio performance. Features real-time stock price updates, portfolio allocation visualization, and gain/loss tracking.

blockchain.title: C# Blockchain API
blockchain.description: A simple blockchain implementation in C# using ASP.NET Core Web API. Features block creation with proof-of-work, chain validation, and RESTful endpoints with Swagger documentation.

chatbot.title: Angular Chat Bot
chatbot.description: An Angular-based chatbot that helps screen for memory loss through interactive and adaptive conversations.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
